action.content:
Aşakdaky meseläni ýerine ýetireliň. Maksat, şuňa meňzeş boş gözenegi doldurmak:

▢ ▢ ▢ ▢ ▢
▢ ▢ ▢ ▢ ▢
▢ ▢ ▢ ▢ ▢
▢ ▢ ▢ ▢ ▢
▢ ▢ ▢ ▢ ▢

Aşakda doldurylan gözenek 5-den 5-e çenli we şeýle bolup biler:

▢ ▢ ▢ ▢ ▢
▢ ▢ E ▢ ▢
▢ ▢ ▢ ▢ ▢
▢ ▢ ▢ ▢ ▢
X X X X X

Bu seti maňa ädimme-ädim suratlandyrmagyňyzy isleýärin. "▢" bilen görkezilen boş öýjükleri suratlandyrmagyň zerurlygy ýok. Gözenekdäki diñe harplaryň öýjüklerini suratlandyryň. Soňra "Indiki buýrugyñyz näme?" diýmegime garaşýarsyňyz, soň bolsa indiki ädimiňizi dowam etdirersiňiz. Görkezmeler berlende gözenegiň ululygyny göz öňünde tutuň. Hemme zady suratlandyranyňyzda "GUTARDY" diýýärsiňiz.

Aboveokardaky doldurylan gözenek üçin mysal ädimleri.

Indiki buýrugyñyz näme?
Buýruk: E-ni ikinji hatar üçünji sütüne goýuň

Indiki buýrugyñyz näme?
Buýruk: Iň soňky hatary X bilen dolduryň

Indiki buýrugyñyz näme?
Buýruk: GUTARDY

Bolýar. Aşakdaky mysal üçin muny 5-den 5-e çenli gözenek bilen ýerine ýetirmegiňizi haýyş edýäris.
▢ F ▢ ▢ ▢
F ▢ F ▢ ▢
▢ ▢ F ▢ ▢
F ▢ F ▢ ▢
▢ ▢ F ▢ ▢
Indiki buýrugyñyz näme?

I understand that you want me to fill in the blanks in a 5x5 grid with the letter "F" according to the given instructions. I will follow the instructions and fill in the grid accordingly. I will not fill in the blanks represented by "▢". After filling in each instruction, I will wait for your next command. Please keep in mind the size of the grid and the position of the letters. Once all the instructions are completed, I will say "G
